title: DINORUN Magic Tricks-Kids Magic Set with Magic Hat & Magic Wand & Instruction for Kids, Toys for 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 Year Old Boys Girls Gifts, 75+ Tricks
features: Exciting Magic Tricks for Kids: Introduce your child to the world of magic with this comprehensive set featuring 24 props and 75+ tricks. From a classic magic hat to a cute rabbit doll and a magic wand, this magic kit includes all the essential accessories for endless fun.

Easy to Learn Magic Tricks: A detailed illustrated instruction in English contains every step to start with the magic props. With a lot of practice, children will be able to carry out a great magic show!

Perform Classic Tricks: Produce a rabbit from an empty hat; the illusion of wands floating, bending, and growing; the shaking of a single die to become multiple dice; the restoration of a rope that has been broken; the ability to know the number the spectator is thinking of through telepathic tricks; and more.
Perfect Magic Set for 6+ Year Old: Designed for children aged 6 7 8 9 10 11 12, this magic set is safe, easy to use, and provides hours of entertainment for young magicians.

Perfect Magic Kit Gifts for Kids: Whether for birthdays, Christmas, parties, or special occasions, this children's magic kit makes a fantastic gift that will spark joy and wonder in any young magician-in-training. Prepare to be amazed by this captivating magic set designed for young magicians.
description: Product Description Dice Box Steps: 1. Place the small dice inside the large dice, then put them in the box and cover it. 2. Pick up the box and shake it vigorously up and down, causing the large dice to be attracted by the iron piece on the bottle cap. 3. The small dice falls out, completing the performance. Magic Hat and Rabbit Steps: 1. There is an opening inside the hat; hide the rabbit in it before performing. 2. Show that there is nothing in the hat, then pretend to cast a spell with the magic wand. 3. Take out the rabbit from inside the hat to complete the performance. Magic Box Steps: 1. Place the prop inside the box, pretend to shake it a few times. 2. There is a mechanism at the bottom of the prop box; gently push it out with your hand to hide the prop in between layers. 3. Crossing Ball Steps: 1. Show the audience that there is no problem with the box, quietly slide the opening of the box to the bottom, then cover it with a lid at the top of the box. 2. Put on a rubber band; at this point, the bottom is hollow. Simply hit the ball forcefully on the bottom of the box, and the ball will go into the box. The video showcases the product in use.
